creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: irregular shaped stoneware incense burner with black glaze exterior and gold interior; squat cylindrical tripod bowl (a); tall, perforated lid (b) shaped like a tapered cylinder that has been cut horizontally and squashed down slightly; natural wood box with lid, marigold color cloth wrap, and dark green tie
inscription: lid verso: 截土容黒耀香炉   六兵衞; signed 六兵衞 {Rokubei}, red seal 清
markings: impressed maker\'s mark at bottom center of bowl; red stamp on top of box lid on on cloth wrap
title: Incense burner with black Setsudoyō glaze
